short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will automatically play next episode for you and skip intro

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension is designed to save your time!
It works exclusively on jut.su episode pages, skipping intros and automatically playing the next episodes.

Extension runs in partial fullscreen mode, you can press F11 to switch to complete fullscreen mode. The next episodes will then play in complete fullscreen.
